mapper.insert: insert into board(title,content, writer_id, latitude, longitude, room_type, contract_type, rental_fee, address, detail_address, write_date, deleted) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{roomType}, #{contractType}, #{rentalFee}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, room_type = #{roomType}, contract_type = #{contractType}, rental_fee = #{rentalFee}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detailAddress} where writer_id = #{writerId}
mapper.select: select board.id id, title, content, room_type roomType, contract_type contractType, rental_fee rentalFee, address, detail_address detailAddress, write_date writeDate, latitude, longitude, nvl(nickname,'탈퇴회원') writerNickName, writer_id writerId from board join users on board.id = #{id} and board.deleted = 0 and board.writer_id = users.id
